source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Handmade Soap Making & Butter Making Recipes for Beginners
items.headline: This course is a complete guideline on make Handmade Soap and body butter making
objectives_summary: How to make handmade Soap? Soap Making step by step
Learn to make body butter at home step by step
How to use body butter

items.title: The Beauty of Portrait Drawing - The 3/4 View
items.headline: From Italy with Love
objectives_summary: Skull anatomy (from the 3/4 view).
The muscles of the head (from the 3/4 view).
A tridimensional simplified form that you can use anytime to draw the human head with ease.

items.title: Painting a Sand Dollar Beach Scene with Watercolor
items.headline: Relaxing watercolor course on creating layers and depth.
objectives_summary: Students will learn to create a lovely beach scene with a sand dollar using watercolors.

items.headline: With Watercolor or Gouache
objectives_summary: How to choose a good animal subject to paint
How to draw accurately and judge proportions
How to use watercolor or gouache to paint fur and other features

items.title: Oil painting tutorial desert landscape, musicians and dancer
items.headline: How to paint Rajasthan Sahara desert landscape, sky and clouds, figurative group of people male & female, tribal dancer
objectives_summary: How to paint desert
Brushes and paints used for painting
How to paint sky and clouds

items.title: How to Make Soap from Scratch using Cold Process Method
items.headline: Learn Making soap from Scratch using Cold Process Method
objectives_summary: The Cold Process Method to make Soap Step by Step
DIY Basic 4-oil Recipes of Soap making and 3-oil soap Recipes
How to make a Lye solution for Cold Process soap

objectives_summary: art composition
Creative thinking skills
creative process

items.headline: Learn how to create beautiful Christmas baubles using Acrylic Pouring/Fluid Art
objectives_summary: How to decorate beautiful Christmas Baubles using acrylic pouring

items.title: Make Soap With the Cold Process and also Hot Process Soap
items.headline: Soap with the cold process, and hot process , This course is a complete guideline
objectives_summary: How to make the soap with the cold process complete guideline
How to make Hot Process Soap in a crock pot step by step
How to make Activated Charcoal face soap

items.title: How to Draw Hyper Realistic Lips
items.headline: Using pencil, charcoal and chalk to draw the human lips
objectives_summary: How to draw hyper realistic lips and teeth
Understanding how to apply the materials and tools
Understanding proportions and shapes

items.title: The Ultimate Colored Pencil Drawing Course
items.headline: The Complete Colored Pencil Drawing Masterclass
objectives_summary: Familiarity with the tools needed for the colored pencil technique
Learn how to draw using checkered lines and geometric shapes
Recognize primary and secondary colors

items.title: Glass Beads 103.2-Latticino Cane
items.headline: Lacy Latticino Cane for Intricate Glass Beads
objectives_summary: The student will learn how to create latticino cane from stringers and clear glass.
The student will learn how to use an optic mold to make more complex latticino cane.
The student will learn how to use filigrana to make latticino cane of different colors.

items.title: From Traditional to Digital Drawing

visible_instructors.title: LearningWhilePracticing LWP
visible_instructors.job_title: We aim to teach in a fun and useful way!
visible_instructors.name: LearningWhilePracticing

items.headline: Learn how to transition from the pencil and paper to the world of digital graphics
objectives_summary: Use the pen tool on Adobe Illustrator
Create and Optimize a Lineart
Become familiar in working with Layers

items.title: Watercolor Painting Apple Blossom; Best Success Techniques
items.headline: Step-by-step guidance and top tips to create your own beautiful flower art with watercolour; beginners, all levels
objectives_summary: Learn how to paint some lovely apple blossom flowers using watercolours; master a range of watercolor techniques through learning by 'watching' and 'doing'
Paint flower petals, foliage, shadows, backgrounds, layer colour, apply glazes, soften hard edges, overlap large washes, create texture, use masking, etc.
Use colour creatively; use blended colour washes to make your paintings glow; add layers of colour to create depth, shape and shading.

items.title: Kawaii Cute Characters Drawing Course for Kids
items.headline: Practical, didactic and perfect course for parents who want to spend more time with their sons doing something fun.
objectives_summary: Draw the basics
Children's drawings for parents children to draw together
Draw Kawaii the easy way
